pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Blade (2004, TV show)$(br2)Used to access Blade's $(l:blade/riders/blade#jack)Jack$(/l) and $(l:blade/riders/blade#king)King$(/l) forms$(br2)Used to access Garren's $(l:blade/riders/garren#jack)Jack$(/l) and $(l:blade/riders/garren#king)King$(/l) forms$(br2)Used to access Leangle's $(l:blade/riders/leangle#jack)Jack$(/l) and $(l:blade/riders/leangle#king)King$(/l) forms
